00007     Token Lexer::readNumber()
00008     {
00009         if (!isdigit( _stream.peek() )) return Token( &Parser::nil, _nil_ );
00010 
00011         long i = 0;
00012 
00013         while (isdigit( _stream.peek() ))
00014         {
00015             _buffer[i++] = _stream.getc();
00016         }
00017 
00018         if (_stream.peek() == '.')
00019         {
00020             _stream.getc();
00021             
00022             if (_stream.peek() == '.')
00023             {
00024                 _stream.unget( '.' );
00025 
00026                 return Token( &Parser::number, atof( _buffer ) );
00027             }
00028             else if (isdigit( _stream.peek() ))
00029             {
00030                 _buffer[i++] = '.';
00031                 
00032                 while (isdigit( _stream.peek() ))
00033                 {
00034                     _buffer[i++] = _stream.getc();
00035                 }
00036             }
00037             else return Token( &Parser::nil, _nil_ );
00038         }
00039 
00040         return Token( &Parser::number, atof( _buffer ) );
00041     }

00043     Token Lexer::readString()
00044     {
00045         if (_stream.peek() != '"') return Token( &Parser::nil, _nil_ );
00046 
00047         _stream.getc();
00048 
00049         long i = 0;
00050 
00051         while (_stream.peek() != '"')
00052         {
00053             _buffer[i++] = _stream.getc();
00054         }
00055 
00056         _stream.getc();
00057 
00058         return Token( &Parser::stringx, new String( _buffer ) );
00059     }

00061     Token Lexer::readOperator()
00062     {
00063         const static string operators = "+-*/.,<>@";
00064         int c = _stream.peek();
00065 
00066         if (operators.find_first_of( c ) == string::npos)
00067             return Token( &Parser::nil, _nil_ );
00068 
00069         int i = 0;
00070 
00071         while (c = _stream.peek(), operators.find_first_of( c ) != string::npos)
00072         {
00073             _buffer[i++] = _stream.getc();
00074         }
00075 
00076         //if (_buffer[0] == '.' && _buffer[1] == '.')
00077         //    return Token( &Parser::range, &Symbol::at( _buffer ) );
00078         if (_buffer[0] == '-' && _buffer[1] == '>')
00079             return Token( &Parser::arrow, &Symbol::at( _buffer ) );
00080         else
00081             return Token( &Parser::operatorx, &Symbol::at( _buffer ) );
00082     }

00084     Token Lexer::readIdentifier()
00085     {
00086         if (!isalpha( _stream.peek() )) return Token( &Parser::nil, _nil_ );
00087 
00088         long i = 0;
00089 
00090         while (isalpha( _stream.peek() ) || _stream.peek() == '-')
00091         {
00092             _buffer[i++] = _stream.getc();
00093         }
00094 
00095         if (_stream.peek() == ':')
00096         {
00097             _buffer[i] = _stream.getc();
00098             
00099             return Token( &Parser::keyword, &Symbol::at( _buffer ) );
00100         }
00101 
00102         return Token( &Parser::identifier, &Symbol::at( _buffer ) );
00103     }
00104 
00105     Token Lexer::readSubexpr()
00106     {
00107         long c = _stream.peek();
00108 
00109         if (c != '(' && c != ')') return Token( &Parser::nil, _nil_ );
00110 
00111         _buffer[0] = _stream.getc();
00112 
00113         if (c == '(')
00114             return Token( &Parser::openexpr, &Symbol::at( _buffer ) );
00115         else
00116             return Token( &Parser::closeexpr, &Symbol::at( _buffer ) );
00117     }
00118 
00119     Token Lexer::readAssign()
00120     {
00121         if ( _stream.peek() != '=' ) return Token( &Parser::nil, _nil_ );
00122 
00123         _buffer[0] = _stream.getc();
00124 
00125         return Token( &Parser::assign, &Symbol::at( _buffer ) );
00126     }
00127 
00128     Token Lexer::readTerminator()
00129     {
00130         if ( _stream.peek() != 10 && _stream.peek() != EOF ) return Token( &Parser::nil, _nil_ );
00131 
00132         int c = _stream.getc();
00133 
00134         if (c == 10)
00135             return Token( &Parser::terminator, &Symbol::at( "[terminator]") );
00136         else if (c == EOF)
00137             return Token( &Parser::endstream, &Symbol::at( "[endstream]") );
00138         else
00139             return Token( &Parser::nil, _nil_ );
00140     }
00141 
00142     Token Lexer::readComment()
00143     {
00144         if (_stream.peek() != '#') return Token( &Parser::nil, _nil_ );
00145         
00146         int i = 0;
00147 
00148         while (_stream.peek() != 10)
00149         {
00150             _buffer[i++] = _stream.getc();
00151         }
00152 
00153         return Token( &Parser::nil, &Symbol::at( _buffer ) );
00154     }
